mapper.insert: insert into member(user_num, user_id, user_pw, name, user_email, user_address, user_address2, user_phone) values(member_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{name}, #{user_email}, #{user_address}, #{user_address2}, #{user_phone})
mapper.select: select name,admin from member where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
select count(*) from member where user_id = #{id}
select count(*) from member where user_email = #{user_email} and user_email != (select user_email from member where user_id = #{user_id})
select count(*) from member where user_email = #{user_email}
mapper.update: update member set user_pw= #{user_pw}, user_email=#{user_email}, user_address=#{user_address}, user_address2=#{user_address2}, user_phone=#{user_phone} where user_num=#{user_num}
mapper.select: SELECT mem.user_id, user_pw, name, auth FROM member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN member_auth auth on mem.user_id = auth.user_id WHERE mem.user_id = #{user_id}
